description: Numbers n with property that number of partitions-into-distinct-parts of n is a perfect square.
comments: Next term, if it exists, is greater than 50000. - _David Wasserman_, Aug 06 2002
mathematica: okQ[n_] := IntegerQ[Sqrt[PartitionsQ[n]]]; Select[Range[10000], okQ] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 13 2011 *)
